p: Finally, compound VIb with 4-fluoro-3-methoxyphenyl moiety was the most potent pyrazole derivative and exhibited moderate to good inhibitory activity towards many cancer cell lines. It showed percent of cell growth promotion for colon cancer HCT-116, leukaemia K-562, non-small cell lung cancer HOP-92, and colon cancer HT29 of 61.10%, 58.92%, 57.13%, and 20.27%, respectively (cell growth inhibition: 38.9%, 41.08%, 42.87%, and 79.73%, respectively).
